channel.title: Vitality Client Developer
channel.description:
Hey all! We are making a brand new revamp of our old server, and we need some trusty coders! This is a great way for any good coders to show off their work, we'll be providing full credits and you can be assured that your work is in safe, trusted hands. We can't pay cash YET, but we'll make sure you are recognized, offer forums ranks and ingame ranks AND when we get donations, we'll pay what we can.
So, if you want to help code a great project, please fill in this form and comment below. We are developing Erasedpkz client so you need knowledge in that area.
[code] First and Last Name:
Date of Birth:
Time Zone:
Past experience in working with Private Servers:
Past experience with RuneScape Private Servers:
Which Languages other than Java do you know:
Examples of your work:
Can you Develop Server-sided content as well:
Other than Private Server Development, please list your capabilities:
How do you wish to be compensated:
How can we contact you: [/code]
You will be expected to add the following and more: Interfaces Auto-updating - Players don't have to re-download the client if it gets updated. 718 revision items and npcs Custom maps Music/Sound system - Sounds and music which can be unlocked and turned off/down. New unlock-able emotes/animations Working world map - Zooming and different layers.
We realize it's a fairly difficult list, and we don't expect one person to do it all, but if you want to apply you must be able to do at least one of these things.

item.title: Vitality Client Developer
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

pretty sure music system would be nearly all server sided. just saying especially if your going by regions.

Read full topic

item.title: Vitality Client Developer
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

You’re welcome for the Application. Good luck.

Did it this morning in a rush, apologies for not giving you the credit But yes, thanks for the application, it’s a lot better than my previous one

Loveandpower:

Something else that I suggest adding are actual examples of what you expect them to be able to do as a client developer. Without listing some example key items it would be difficult to gauge what level of a developer your looking for

Alright I’ll add that now Ty.

Read full topic

@pasta186 wrote:

Hey all!
We are making a brand new revamp of our old server, and we need some trusty coders! This is a great way for any good coders to show off their work, we’ll be providing full credits and you can be assured that your work is in safe, trusted hands. We can’t pay cash YET, but we’ll make sure you are recognized, offer forums ranks and ingame ranks AND when we get donations, we’ll pay what we can.

First and Last Name:
